channel.title: Unmuteing a player
channel.description: In joshhorn573 scape a player was muted unfairly by a craze mod (demoted), i was just wondering how we can unmute this player, we have tried, deleting the char, but its still muted! PLEASE HELP!

item.title: Unmuteing a player
item.dc:creator: @deidera deidera
item.description:
@deidera wrote:

ancientmage:

you can’t unmute no 1 has made the code for it and if they have i never seen it yet… the person will just have to wait till the mute is done normally set for 48hrs

Ok,I have the same thought.I think when you mute/ban someone/IP ban,it has to be pernament,can’t be un-done.Then again,we could be wrong.If someone codes it to un-ban,then it’ll be great for all server owners,including me.

Read full topic
